answers.question: Have you participated in a previous Gitcoin Grants Round? If so, please name the rounds or link the builder profile associated with previous rounds.

answers.answer:
Pheasant Network leverages intent-based bridging and an advanced cross-chain swap protocol to connect 30+ blockchain networks with speed and efficiency. By seamlessly connecting fragmented blockchain ecosystems while preserving security, we enhance interoperability and streamline cross-chain interactions.

Pheasant Network is an Intent-centric solution and is expected to expand as the Intent ecosystem develops.
answers.question: How does your project contribute to the growth of the OSS ecosystem? Please provide specific examples of how your application enhances or expands the current ecosystem.

answers.answer:
We believe that by seamlessly connecting the fragmented blockchain ecosystem and tokens, the future of Web3 can be realized without users being aware of which blockchain they are using. If a user wanted to convert different tokens on different blockchains to different tokens on different blockchains, they would previously have to use DEX and Bridge separately. However, using the cross-chain swap, this can be accomplished in a single transaction.

Pheasant Network is unique in that it is fastest and most cost-effective than any other solution because of its unique optimistic mechanism.
answers.question: What features or use cases does your dApp/App present? How is it differentiated?

answers.answer: Pheasant Network has integrated 10+ networks in Bridge and 30+ networks in Swap. More networks will be integrated in the future, and grant funds will be used to develop them.
answers.question: What are your plans for further development, and how will the grant funds be used to achieve these goals?

answers.question: For any project deploying smart contracts on blockchain networks, please list all your deployer addresses and their corresponding blockchain networks. Use this format for each entry: [deployer_address], [chain_id]â€”for example, 0x123abc..., 42161 (This represents a deployer address on the Arbitrum network). Please include a separate line for each unique deployer address and blockchain combination.

project.title: Pheasant Network
project.description:
Pheasant Network is an optimistic interoperability protocol offering a suite of solutions that unify all Layer 2 infrastructures. Pheasant Network links infrastructures across Ethereum and Layer 2 ecosystems by offering an optimistic-based Bridge-as-a-Service (BaaS) solution that allows developers to seamlessly integrate native bridge and swap functionality into their applications. Our robust security system and cost-effective design enable cheaper and faster asset transfers between Ethereum and Layer 2 networks while ensuring security and decentralization.

Our mission is to provide a long-term contribution to the Ethereum ecosystem as a community-driven project and serve the public good. We are looking forward to your participation in creating a sustainable solution together.

Our robust security system and cost-effective design enable cheaper and faster asset transfers between Ethereum and Layer 2 networks while ensuring security and decentralization.

Our mission is to provide a long-term contribution to the Ethereum ecosystem as a community-driven project and serve the public good. We are looking forward to your participation in creating a sustainable solution together.
